name: RIS_ASGN_PROV
description: This table contains the assigned physicians for an imaging order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the assigned radiologists.

columns.name: RAD_ASGN_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.
